attacks.name: Shell Trap
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nitro Tank-GX
attacks.effect: Attach 5 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
